What is the purpose of the `getaccountaddress` command in Verus?
The `getaccountaddress` command returns the current VRSC address for receiving payments to a specified account.

getaccountaddress "account"

DEPRECATED. Returns the current VRSC address for receiving payments to this account.

Arguments:
1. "account"    (string, required) MUST be set to the empty string "" to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error.

Result:
"VRSC_address"  (string) The account VRSC address

Examples:
> verus getaccountaddress 
> verus getaccountaddress ""
> verus getaccountaddress "myaccount"
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getaccountaddress", "params": ["myaccount"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
./raw_text_input_api_text/getaccountaddress
What is the required format for the "account" argument when using the `getaccountaddress` command?
The "account" argument must be set to an empty string (`""`), which represents the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error.

DEPRECATED. Returns the current VRSC address for receiving payments to this account.

The result of the `getaccountaddress` command is a string representing the account VRSC address.

getaccountaddress "account"

DEPRECATED. Returns the current VRSC address for receiving payments to this account.

Arguments:

Can I use the `getaccountaddress` command with a specific account name, such as "myaccount"?

No, you cannot use the `getaccountaddress` command with a specific account name. The "account" argument must be set to an empty string (`""`), which represents the default account. Passing any other string, such as "myaccount", will result in an error.

getaccountaddress "account"

DEPRECATED. Returns the current VRSC address for receiving payments to this account.

Arguments:
1. "account"    (string, required) MUST be set to the empty string "" to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error.

"VRSC_address"  (string) The account VRSC address
